fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Education and training, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Public Health
head_office_address: European Aerobiology Society c/o Meteo Swiss att. Dr. B. Clot
eu_initiatives: Standardization of airborne allergenic pollen research. Research-based information about allergenic pollen/spores load.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
Our aims are the following: (i) to promote aerobiology and to further its development; (ii) to facilitate collaboration, research, education, information, technical development and practical application in the field of aerobiology; (iii) to create a platform for the persons, associations, societies and institutions with an interest in aerobiology in Europe; 
to elect the body responsible for organizing the European Symposia on Aerobiology; (iv) to encourage collaboration with other areas of science.
relevant_communication:
COST ES0603 Assessment of production, release, distribution and health impact of allergenic pollen in Europe. 2006-2011. 
COST FA1203 Sustainable management of Ambrosia artemisiifolia in Europe (SMARTER). 2012-2016.  
The Executive Agency for Health and Consumers. Health Impacts of Airborne Allergen Information Network (HIALINE). 2009-2011.
